While working on enhancement 90625, I encountered the following exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.AgentImpl.handleCommand(AgentImpl.java:704)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.AgentImpl$2.incommingCommand(AgentImpl.java:256)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ConnectionImpl$1.incommingCommand(ConnectionImpl.java:179)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ConnectionImpl.processControlMessage(ConnectionImpl.java:414)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ConnectionImpl$SocketReaderThread.run(ConnectionImpl.java:500)

From a rough look at the code, it looks like the cleanup() has already been
invoked, so getProcess() returns null. Adding "if (process != null)" before
"process.handleCommand(command)" fixes the problem, but I'd like someone with a
better knowledge of this piece of code to have a look and determine it it is the
appropriate fix.

If you need to reproduce, let me know and I'll commit my latest changes to CVS
(and provide the steps to reproduce).
Closing the defect as this issue seems to have been addressed.
